Welcome to Your Future Investment

We created an investment where you have zero risk and absolutely total control over all your assets and positions. Come and live the new era of real investments.

Download Whitepaper

/ 00. welcome _

/ 00. future _

/ 00. welcome _

/ 01. Overview _

Overview

This is an ICO like no other. Its an opportunity to spread your investment in currencies of the future. We know the market, we know cryptocurrency.

Everyone regrets not buying into bitcoin. We’re not saying this will be the next bitcoin but we are saying our cryptocurrency investment experts will spot it. No-one can predict the future, but we can stack the probability in our favour. This is an ICO like no other – we will spread our fund in to other up and coming Cryptocurrencies including strategic investment into suitable Initial Coin Offerings that meet our stringent criteria. Every 3 months half of the total portfolio will be transferred into Ethereum and distributed to every holder of InvestmentCoin via a SmartContract.

With the large funds available to us InvestmentCoin will be able to leverage advantageous prices on the portfolio of ICOs we buy in to. Expected returns upwards of 5 times the initial investment will be amplified by our ability to gain initial discounts of between 30 to 50% on future ICOs.

Our initial 2 year life-cycle target is to reach 100 times the ICO funds raised. This will trigger a distribution of 90% of the portfolios value back to all investors holding the InvestmentCoin via a SmartContract. The remaining 10% will be re-invested in the next InvestmentCoin 2 year life-cycle.

/ 00. Who we are _

/ 02. Team _

Team

We will be heavily investing in emerging coins.

Our team of fund managers use their wealth of knowledge and bespoke analytical systems to scan the cryptocurrency markets to spot great potential, particularly the new ICOs with growth expectations above the norm.

Our expertise combines the understanding of traditional market investment with the skills required to move fast and accurately in the new and growing world of cryptocurrency.

/ 03. Conversions _

Conversions

Because energy is constantly transforming itself. Never stops, never dies, just keep moving in different entities.

Signup

If you are looking at putting more than $10,000 in, contact our customer service to see the bonuses dependant on the money you are putting into this.

/ 04 Token Sale _

Token Sale

All the stages of the Investment Revolution.

  • stage 1 currently active 15 million tokens
    available at $1.00 per token
  • stage 2 currently active 15 million tokens
    available at $1.50 per token
  • stage 3 currently active 5 million tokens
    available at $2.00 per token

/ 00. welcome to your future _

Our Story

We have been researching cryptocurrencies since early 2011.

We are experienced traders with a vast knowledge about cryptocurrencies. We recognise that cryptocurrencies have until recently been the preserve of those with the technical knowhow to invest. We want to make it open to those who are keen but don’t know how to spot the individual winners. InvestmentCoin is making it simple for you to invest. By using our vast funds we will spot the winners, we will create leverage to buy in to ICOs early and at lower prices. In short we will make you money and we will benefit by our own holding in InvesmentCoin. The bigger the InvestmentCoin fund becomes the stronger we get and the more we grow returns.

Payouts

Every 03 months, one payout.

Every 3 months, half of the total portfolio value will be transferred into Ethereum and distributed among holders of the InvestmentCoin via a smartcontract – you wont have to do anything.

At the end of the first 2 year life-cycle each InvestmentCoin will payout its share of the 90% distribution of the fund value in Ethereum. This is targeted to be 100 times the initial fund value.

Benefits

Working with the pro's do have many perks. A complete structure to ensure consistent profits.

  • We do all the research and we spread the investment. All you do is invest in the one coin – InvestmentCoin. Hold the token to retain your place in the fund.

  • We have professionals working full time to spot the hidden gems and to generate the profits

  • The longer you hold, the more value the coin will have and the more you will receive back in Ethereum

  • We can use our fund to create leverage to buy into ICOs at a cheaper price.
